title: Lakeview apartment for rent (W Briar)
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Huge unit that gets great natural light - Large king bedroom - Galley kitchen w/ lots of cabinet space - Vintage bathroom w/ solid tile work & good water pressure - Hardwood floors - Great closet space  All Units at 540 W. Briar are HEAT INCLUDED! This charming vintage elevator mid rise building is in the heat of all things Lakeview! Shopping, great restaurants, night life and lake activities all within a few short blocks. 540 W. Briar has an onsite staff, laundry room, bike storage & work out room. Express bus around the corner & 5 / 10 minute walk to el.  ICM Properties Inc. is a professional management company since 1966.
